module:
CertusNet
This module defines modules configuration.
1.0
operational-info container urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info
MOD 0
declarations container urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/declarations
MOD 0
ru-instance-id leaf urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/declarations/ru-instance-id string a unique instance identifier that may be used to identify a particular hardware instance, e.g., when used performing hierarchical management via the O-DU.
YES
MOD 0
supported-mplane-version leaf urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/declarations/supported-mplane-version string Parameter provides highest M-Plane specification version device is compliant with.
YES
1.0.0 MOD 0
supported-cusplane-version leaf urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/declarations/supported-cusplane-version string Parameter provides highest CUS-Plane specification version device is compliant with.
YES
1.0.0 MOD 0
supported-header-mechanism list urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/declarations/supported-header-mechanism
protocol ADD RMV MOD 0
protocol leaf urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/declarations/supported-header-mechanism/protocol enumeration Transport protocol type.
YES
ECPRI,IEEE-1914-3
MOD 0
ecpri-concatenation-support leaf urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/declarations/supported-header-mechanism/ecpri-concatenation-support boolean This leaf is used to indicate whether the O-RU supports the optional eCPRI concatenation capability
YES
false MOD 0
protocol-version leaf urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/declarations/supported-header-mechanism/protocol-version string Header protocol version.
YES
1.0 MOD 0
operational-state container urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/operational-state
MOD 0
restart-cause leaf urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/operational-state/restart-cause enumeration the cause for the last restart of the O-RAN Network Element
YES
POWER-ON,SUPERVISION-WATCHDOG,MPLANE-TRIGGERED-RESTART,SOFTWARE-FAILURE,OTHER-WATCHDOG-TIMER,UNKNOWN
MOD 0
restart-datetime leaf urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/operational-state/restart-datetime date-and-time The system date and time when the system last restarted.
YES
MOD 0
clock container urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/clock
MOD 0
timezone-name leaf urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/clock/timezone-name string An optional TZ database name to use for the system, such as 'Europe/Stockholm' Time zone name is an informative leaf and is NOT used in the managed element to convert local time zone. The managed element may include time zone name in measurement or fault data.
YES
MOD 0
timezone-utc-offset leaf urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/clock/timezone-utc-offset int16 The number of minutes to add to UTC time to identify the time zone for this system. For example, 'UTC - 8:00 hours' would be represented as '-480'.
YES minutes -720 .. 840 0 MOD 0
re-call-home-no-ssh-timer leaf urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /operational-info/re-call-home-no-ssh-timer uint16 A common timer used by the O-RAN equipment to trigger the repeated call home procedure to all identified call home servers to which the O-RAN equipment has not already an established SSH connection. A value of 0 means that the O-RAN equipment shall disable operation of the timer triggered NETCONF call home procedure.
YES seconds
60 MOD 0
rpcs:
reset rpc urn:o-ran:operations:1.0 o-ran-ops o-ran-operations /reset
